CustomField.description: If there are multiple leads for the same company, one lead is designated as the Primary Lead. The primary lead--usually a decision maker--is the person the NSR wants to talk to and will show up in call lists. Other leads will look up to the Primary Lead and will be accessible through a related list on the Primary Lead record and not included in Call Lists.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the Primary Lead to which this lead should be associated.
CustomField.label: Primary Lead
